class wp4.samples.models.DeviationMixin(*args, **kwargs)[source]Â¶

In place of Deviation records on a worksheet, we have a way of tracking them per sample. Also holds the meta question of whether this specific sample was actually taken or not.

Parameters:
  • collected (django.db.models.NullBooleanField) – Sample taken as “Sample taken”
  • notes (django.db.models.TextField) – Notes as “Notes” - Notes

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

class wp4.samples.models.WP7Record(*args, **kwargs)[source]Â¶

Based on an export from the WP7 Database. A record in this table means a sample exists on file in the Biobank

Parameters:
  • id (django.db.models.AutoField) – ID as “ID”
  • barcode (django.db.models.CharField) – Barcode number as “Barcode number”
  • content_type_id (django.db.models.ForeignKey) – content type as “content type”
  • object_id (django.db.models.PositiveIntegerField) – object id as “object id”
  • box_number (django.db.models.CharField) – box number as “box number”
  • position_in_box (django.db.models.CharField) – position in box as “position in box”
content_typeÂ¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

object_idÂ¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

content_objectÂ¶

Provide a generic many-to-one relation through the content_type and object_id fields.

This class also doubles as an accessor to the related object (similar to ForwardManyToOneDescriptor) by adding itself as a model attribute.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

class wp4.samples.models.Event(*args, **kwargs)[source]Â¶

A Sample Event is a timepoint and process where a specific type of biological sample was extracted from a person. This even can validate whether enough biological samples were taken (e.g. a blood sample results in two separate containers; whereas a perfusate sample has only one), and acts as the link between a Worksheet and the various Sample types

Parameters:
  • id (django.db.models.AutoField) – ID as “ID”
  • record_locked (django.db.models.BooleanField) – record locked as “record locked” - record locked
  • live (livefield.fields.LiveField) – live as “live”
  • type (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – Sample type as “Sample type”
  • name (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – Sample Process as “Sample Process”
  • taken_at (django.db.models.DateTimeField) – Date and time taken as “Date and time taken”

NAME_CHOICES = ((1, 'DB1 Donor Blood Sample'), (2, 'DU1 Donor Urine Sample at Withdrawal of Support'), (3, 'DU2 Donor Urine Sample from Catheter Bag'), (4, 'P1 Perfusate solution after 15 mins of HMP'), (5, 'P2 Perfusate solution prior to departure'), (6, 'P3 Perfusate solution at end of machine perfusion'), (7, 'RKT Kidney Biopsy after reperfusion'), (8, 'RB1 Blood sample after anaesthesia '), (9, 'RB2 Blood sample after reperfusion'))Â¶

Limit of choices for Event name data

taken_atÂ¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

clean()[source]Â¶

If type is...

  • BLOOD - check for two different types of BloodSample
  • URINE - check for one type of UrineSample
  • PERFUSATE - check for one type of PerfusateSample
  • TISSUE - check for two different types of TissueSample

... and that a suitable Event name was chosen, and that taken_at value is not in the future.

Returns:None
get_absolute_url()[source]Â¶
exception DoesNotExistÂ¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturnedÂ¶
bloodsample_setÂ¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

class wp4.samples.models.BloodSample(*args, **kwargs)[source]Â¶

Sample class type for Blood samples.

Also contains a helper (repeated, but direct) link to the Patient this sample was from (mainly to aide reverse sample look ups from Patient)

Parameters:
  • id (django.db.models.AutoField) – ID as “ID”
  • record_locked (django.db.models.BooleanField) – record locked as “record locked” - record locked
  • live (livefield.fields.LiveField) – live as “live”
  • barcode (django.db.models.CharField) – Barcode number as “Barcode number”
  • collected (django.db.models.NullBooleanField) – Sample taken as “Sample taken”
  • notes (django.db.models.TextField) – Notes as “Notes” - Notes
  • event_id (django.db.models.ForeignKey) – event as “event” - event
  • blood_type (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – Blood sample type as “Blood sample type”
  • person_id (django.db.models.ForeignKey) – Blood sample from as “Blood sample from”
  • centrifuged_at (django.db.models.DateTimeField) – Time sample centrifuged as “Time sample centrifuged”

wp7_locationÂ¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the one-to-many relation created by GenericRelation.

In the example:

class Post(Model):
    comments = GenericRelation(Comment)

post.comments is a ReverseGenericManyToOneDescriptor instance.

clean()[source]Â¶

If sample is marked as collected, confirm taken_at date is present, otherwise that deviation notes have been recorded.

Ensure that centrifuged_at datetime is not in the future, and that it occured after taken_at datetime

Returns:None

clean()[source]Â¶

If sample is marked as collected, confirm taken_at date is present, otherwise that deviation notes have been recorded.

Ensure that centrifuged_at datetime is not in the future, and that it occured after taken_at datetime
